title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Designing ICT-Based Asynchronous Language Education for African Regions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience in operating digital devices
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can improve language expressiveness by over 50% through biweekly asynchronous discussion forum participation using smartphones
Learners can reduce language errors by 30% through at least one peer feedback exchange using ICT tools
Learners can acquire digital content production skills in offline classrooms to complete a 2-minute language presentation video

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
